detail_desc: Fabric cap with elastication at the back.
Shirt jacket in sturdy cotton corduroy with a collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with concealed press-studs, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.

Striped, calf-length dress in woven fabric with notch lapels and a wrapover front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a yoke at the back and a seam at the waist with pleats and a tie at the side. Unlined.
High-waisted trousers in a stretch weave with a slight sheen. Fly with a visible zip, diagonal zipped pockets at the front and slim legs.
Short suede skirt with decorative seams. Visible zip at the back. Lined.
Set with six earrings and three ear cuffs made of metal in various sizes and designs.
Short dress in a textured, cotton-blend weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with gathers on the shoulders and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Dresses in airy cotton jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups that have decorative metal buttons. Jetted front pockets, and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print and sequined motif on the front, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and a scalloped trim around the neckline.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Short, fitted dress in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
T-shirt bra in jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back. The polyamide content of the bra is recycled.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top, short sleeves and an elasticated seam and decorative tie detail at the waist. Practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
Metal stud earrings and a pair of hoop earrings in various sizes and designs decorated with glass rhinestones.
Base layer tights in soft, fast-drying, breathable, functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Large ring made from recycled metal with a coral-shaped decoration.The ring is decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Width approx. 3.5 cm.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening with a concealed button at the front and long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, a decorative belt with a metal buckle, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Jacket in soft faux fur with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, and side pockets. Lined.
5-pocket skirt in stretch denim with hard-worn details, visible sequins in one pocket and an adjustable elasticated waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and patch front pockets.

Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, draping at the front, detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable metal fastener at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the back.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Regular waist with wide elastication and a key pocket in the waistband.
Short A-line skirt.
Metal ball chain necklace with two flat pendants. Length of chain approx. 70 cm.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
Fitted dress in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket trousers in washed, stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Super skinny fit.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Striped jumper in fine-knit cotton with a button placket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave. Deep V-neck front and back with smocking and three rows of flounces, and a visible zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a flared peplum that has a slit at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.

Large shopper in sturdy cotton canvas with contrasting colour imitation leather trims and two handles at the top. The shopper has straps on each short side that can be fastened with a press-stud and tie at the top. Matching, detachable imitation leather purse that is attached with a metal carabiner hook. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 31 cm. Height 33cm. Width 65 cm.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric with a sweetheart neckline and gathered seams at the shoulders and under the bust for a gently draping effect. Short puff sleeves with a jersey lining and concealed elastication at the hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and a jersey-lined skirt. The polyester content of the dress is recycled.

Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Fly with decorative buttons, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lace racer back, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide mesh strap at the back and a metal fastener at the front.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with elastication at the back of the waist and pleats at the front. Zip fly and button, a low crotch and wide, gently tapered legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs with short slits at the hems.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Opening at the back with decorative, crossover straps, a seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in striped satin with trims, a shawl collar and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud fastening. Front pockets and a partially concealed tie belt at the waist. Partly lined.
Checked cotton flannel shirt with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a narrow collar and two flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Chelsea boots in leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Twill linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
T-shirt bra in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jeans in superstretch denim with a seam detail at the top and back pockets. High waist with a cut-out section front and back, zip fly with two buttons at the top and slim legs.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a high waist, sewn-in wrapover front with decorative covered buttons and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.

Round sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces and lenses. The lenses are UV-protective, tinted and polarised. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft cotton jersey.
Skirt in a double layer of tulle with an elasticated waist. Lined.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbed neckline.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Underwired, push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable, partially lace-covered shoulder straps that cross at the back and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Soft, non-wired bra in mesh with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, side support and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Jumper in a fine, marled knit with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with gathered seams at the cuffs. Ribbed hem with a decorative tie at one side.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. T-shirt top in jersey with a round neck. Piqué shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
V-neck, sleeveless top in a cotton weave with pin-tucks at the front and lace trims around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and small embroidered detail on the chest.
Straight-cut jacket in crushed velvet with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Knee-length lace dress with short sleeves, a concealed zip at the back and a seam at the waist with an inset lace trim and pleats. Airy jersey lining.
Tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
